EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Next Steps (1362075516.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Next Steps (1362075516.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE HI Kiran,Sure thing. Since you are in CA it may be useful to use one the notaries on this list <http://www.mbopartners.com/notaries>. We have had some trouble with CA notaries understanding what we are asking of them in the past so using someone on our list should avoid any hassle. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Kiran Kumar [mailto:kkurella@gmail.com] Sent: Thursday, February 28, 2013 1:15 PM To: Sara Conde Cc: Jonathan Lochhaas Subject: Re: MBO Partners Next Steps Hi Sara, I have a pretty tight schedule this week. I will find a notary and get it signed later today or tomorrow. Thanks for following up. I appreciate it. ThanksKiranOn Thu, Feb 28, 2013 at 8:53 AM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Hi Kiran, Thank you for completing the online enrollment. The last step is sending me a copy of your completed I-9. You can find the I-9 form in your enrollment documents; you will sign/date section 1 and a local notary will sign/date section 2 ( there will be instructions on how to complete this form in your enrollment documents as well.) You can send this back to me via email (I don’t need a hard copy.) I will also need you to send me a copy of your permanent resident card (you can just take a picture with your phone and email that to me.) Please feel free to reach out to me with any questions. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028 <tel:703.793.6028>f: 703.793.6068 <tel:703.793.6068>e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcFpMp0J65%2F25JaTsljmOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcFpMp0J65%2F25JaTsljmOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
